mapper.insert: insert into spot_Theme ( theme_no as "themeNo", spot_no as "spotNo") values(#{themeNo}, #{spotNo})
mapper.select: SELECT spot.spot_no AS "spotNo", spot.spot_latitude AS "latitude", spot.spot_longitude AS "longitude", spot_theme.theme_no AS "themeNo", spot_theme.score AS "score", spot.spot_use_num AS "hitcount" FROM spot_theme, spot WHERE spot_theme.spot_no = spot.spot_no AND spot.city_no = #{value}
